Hey there, I am a biologist diving into bioinformatics. I'm interested in bacteria-phage interactions, its evolution and ecology. Currently working on the emergence of phenotypical variants in *B. tequilensis* EA-CB0015 and looking forward to understand what a *gene* is in bacteriophages.
